title: Knopf eines Addons in der Symbolleiste ist verschwunden. Wie hole ich es wieder hervor?
content:
description in German:

Ich habe vor langer Zeit ein Addon installiert. Jetzt wollte ich Firefox neu dekorieren. Deshalb habe ich das Addon in die Sidebar geschoben. Unten links in der Sidebar war dann der kleine Knopf für das Addon. Dadurch konnte das Addon aber nicht auf den aktuellen Offenen Tab zugreifen, jedenfalls hat es nicht funktioniert wie vorher. Also hab ich auf das add on Rechtsklick gemacht und es aus dem Sidebar gelöscht. Es ist jetzt nicht mehr in der Sidebar.

Leider schaffe ich es jetzt nicht mehr, das Addon wieder als Knopf in der oberen Leiste also über den Lesezeichen zu platzieren. Es taucht noch auf wenn ich den Knopf für Addons drücke, und es aus der Liste auswähle.

Kontext: Firefox on Windows Addon, was ich verschoben habe: Addy.io

Problem: Ich will das Addon wieder schnell öffnen können. Es ist nicht weg, es ist nur woanders.

Wie füge ich es wieder der Symbolleiste (oder dem Overflow Menu) hinzu?
creator: upq2iqxy

title: Video's/audio keeps pausing
content:
Dear, When playing a video on Youtube, Jellyfin or listening to the radio the video stops after a second of playing. Restarting FireFox works for a short amount of time and after that constant pausing of video's after pressing play. Really annoying.

What I allready tried - What is pressed --> none - Rebooting PC --> 5-10 min fix - Restarting FireFox --> 5-10 min fix - Updating FireFox --> Was on the newest version of 28 OKT 2025 - Updating Windows 11 --> Was on the newest version - Problem Solving Mode (So plugins/addons disabled) --> No fix - Chrome --> Works perfectly - Brave --> Works perfectly

Any idea's/fixes
creator: ianthomas.everaerts

title: BurnBlend is marketed as a weight-loss & metabolism-boosting supplement
content:
What Is BurnBlend?

BurnBlend is a premium weight-management supplement created to help people burn fat more efficiently while maintaining steady energy throughout the day. It’s formulated using a combination of plant-based extracts, vitamins, and amino acids that target multiple aspects of metabolism. The supplement is designed for both men and women who want a safe, natural way to enhance their weight-loss journey.

How BurnBlend Works

The formula behind BurnBlend focuses on four main mechanisms:

Metabolism Boost: Ingredients such as green tea and coffee bean extracts help increase thermogenesis — the body’s process of burning calories for heat.

Fat Conversion: Compounds like L-Carnitine support the breakdown of stored fat and its conversion into usable energy.

Appetite Control: Minerals such as chromium help balance blood sugar levels and reduce cravings, making it easier to manage portion sizes and avoid snacking.

Energy and Focus: Vitamins B6 and B12, along with L-Theanine, support mental clarity and energy without the jittery side effects associated with high-stimulant formulas.

Key Ingredients

Green Tea Extract: Supports fat oxidation and provides antioxidant protection.

Coffee Bean Extract: Promotes energy and mental alertness.

L-Carnitine: Assists in the transport of fatty acids for energy production.

Chromium Chloride: Helps regulate blood sugar and manage cravings.

Vitamin B6 & B12: Support metabolism and reduce fatigue.

Vitamin D3: Contributes to hormonal balance and immune function.

L-Theanine: Enhances focus and reduces stress-related overeating.

Benefits of BurnBlend

Promotes natural fat burning and calorie use

Increases daily energy and endurance

Reduces appetite and supports better food choices

Enhances focus and mood

Encourages overall wellness and metabolic balance

How to Use BurnBlend

Take two capsules daily with water, preferably before meals. For best results, combine BurnBlend with a balanced diet, regular exercise, and sufficient hydration. Consistency is key — noticeable results typically appear after a few weeks of regular use.

Things to Keep in Mind

While BurnBlend is formulated from natural ingredients, it is not a miracle solution. Sustainable results depend on healthy lifestyle habits. Individuals with medical conditions, pregnant or nursing women, or those taking medication should consult a healthcare professional before use.

Final Thoughts

BurnBlend stands out as a well-rounded supplement that supports weight management through natural processes rather than harsh stimulants or crash diets. Its blend of metabolism-boosting, fat-burning, and energy-enhancing ingredients makes it an appealing option for those seeking a gentle yet effective boost to their health and fitness goals.

Official website : https://burnblend.co.nz/ https://derilapillow.co.nz/ https://burnpeak.co.nz/ https://dentavive.co.nz/ https://derila.co.nz/ https://lipovive.co.nz https://glpro.co.nz/ Pintrest : https://www.pinterest.com/care24x7/ Tumblr : https://www.tumblr.com/blog/healthcareweight

title: My website loads slowly on Firefox compared to Chrome — any optimization tips?
content: Hello everyone, I manage a website, which focuses on mobile phone prices and SIM package information in Bangladesh. I’ve noticed that the site loads noticeably slower in Firefox than in Chrome, especially on pages with large images (like smartphone price lists). I’ve already optimized the images using WebP and enabled LiteSpeed caching on my server. Are there any Firefox-specific performance recommendations I should try (for example, about image lazy loading or compression settings)? Any advice from developers who’ve optimized for Firefox performance would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.
creator: rahmatbl.1122

title: Helping Nashik Businesses to Grow Online
content:
What started out in 2021 as an imaginative and prescient share with the aid of one entrepreneur is now a growing agency with a presence in India, the US, and the UK, supporting clients across the globe. But inspite of its worldwide footprint, Sparklers Infotech has remained deeply related to its roots in Nashik.

Assisting Nashik to pass the digital step, Sparklers Infotech has worked carefully with many famous nearby brands—quietly but successfully reworking how they perform. From creating bespoke websites and mobile applications to supporting organizations going paperless and automating internal processes, the company has helped many traditional businesses to enter into the virtual age with self-belief.

However, what in reality makes the distinction is how they deliver those services—not simply ticking packing containers, but simply being attentive to enterprise needs and information challenges and crafting answers that make sense and are easy to undertake.
